T02D1696:52b-1: bo dhi tsitta ma h'a su kha a'am na ya /
T02D1696:52b-3: byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i man ngag / bde
T02D1696:52b-4: ba chen po byang chub kyi sems la phyag 'tshal
T02D1696:52b-5: lo // gsang rgyud mtha' dag las man ngag gang pa'i don /
T02D1696:52b-6: byang chub kyi sems 'da' ka ma'i man ngag 'di ltar lags te /
T02D1696:52b-8: da ltar bdag gi lus khyab par gnas pa'i sems 'di ni 'ubs kyis 'dus nas /
T02D1696:52b-9: snying ga'i dkyil na 'od mtshon gang ba cig gnas so //
T02D1696:52b-10: yi ge shis pas 'od du mi lta ste /
T02D1696:52b-11: h'um yungs 'bru tsam cig lhang nger gnas so //
T02D1696:52b-12: de nas tsher ba dang bral drod shor te /
T02D1696:52b-13: 'jig rten pa'i spyod yul dang bral ba'o //
T02D1696:52b-14: de tsam na 'od mthing ga de snying gi dkyil nas /
T02D1696:52b-15: byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba'i lam g-yas kyi
T02D1696:52b-16: srog rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba'i nang
T02D1696:52b-17: nas yar yengs kyis byung ste /
T02D1696:52b-21: de nas yar 'dom gang tsam gyis chod nas rnam par dag pa chos kyi pho brang /
T02D1696:52b-22: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas na /
T02D1696:52b-23: dpal kun du bzang po bzhugs te /
T02D1696:52b-24: rang gis khyab gdal ba dang bzhin lhang nge bar te /
T02D1696:52b-25: sku la mdun dang rgyab mi mnga' bar /
T02D1696:52b-26: bde ba chen po'i nang du lhang nger bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1696:52b-27: bdag gi sems h'um ngam thig le yungs 'bru spyi
T02D1696:52b-28: bo nas yar byung ba gnyis kar sbyin la sbrang
T02D1696:52b-29: bu chags pa'am / chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa'i tshul du /
T02D1696:52b-30: kun du bzang po dang gnyis gcig tu lhang nger gnas par gyur to //
T02D1696:52b-31: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab par kun du bzang pos khyab /
T02D1696:52b-32: kun du bzang pos gar khyab par bdag gi sems kyis khyab ste /
T02D1696:52b-33: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog dang bral nas chos kyi sku thob ste /
T02D1696:52b-34: skyid pa chen po g-yung drung gi gnas su khyab gdal la lhang nge bar gnas so //
T02D1696:52b-35: de'i ngang las mi 'gyur lhang nger gnas pa ni /
T02D1696:52b-36: rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba mur thug pa'o //
T02D1696:52b-37: de'i ngang las sa ler gnas pa ni /
T02D1696:52b-38: rdzogs pa chen po'i bsgom pa mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D1696:53a-0: de'i ngang las yud tsam bar @53a * //
T02D1696:53a-2: rdzogs pa chen bo'i dam tshig mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D1696:53a-3: de lta bu'i don la sems rtse gcig tu bsgom mo //
T02D1696:53a-4: byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so /
T02D1696:53a-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na nyid dang /
T02D1696:53a-7: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge ba'i blo gros
